name: Edge
slogan: A data-driven payments platform for esports
description: Our platform is a one-stop shop to manage all contracts, payments and data for the esports community.

jobs.title: Senior Engineer
jobs.description:
About Edge

About the role

ESSENTIAL REQUIREMENTS:
Our platform is created for gamers, managers, and league owners to bring regulation to an
unregulated industry. Edge links social and gaming data to payments via smart contracts.

As our senior engineer you play an integral role within the engineering team. You will lead
the engineering team and build the product whilst working closely with the CEO and design
team to bring ideas and designs to life.

Experience with:
- AWS platform
- Modern ReactJS (IE, functional components)
- Typescript
- Node(express)/Mongo
- Unit and user testing
- Working in or having your own startup leading an engineering team
- Personal development projects
- Github and portfolio of work
Nice to have:
- Interest and knowledge of esports and gaming
- Specific SaaS platform experience

Please send CVs and portfolio links/Github details to recruitment@edge.gg

jobs.title: Senior Operations Associate
jobs.description:
Senior Operations Associate
About Edge

About the role

YOU WILL :
Edge has been connecting gamers, teams, leagues and brands and helping bring new gaming and esports IP
to market since inception in May 2018. Edge protects gamers by providing infrastructure and regulation to the
growing but nascent esports industry.
Our platform provides critical legal and payment infrastructure for teams, leagues and brands in the fast
growing esports and gaming ecosystem. Edge is backed by key industry partners and the founding team has
experience in gaming, esports, legal and tech.

Edge is in need of an operations associate who can help support the team to achieve its potential. This is a
role reporting directly to the CEO that requires an extremely organised all-rounder who wants to roll up their
sleeves and take on responsibility. You’ll be dissatisfied with the status quo and always look for where things
can improve.

- Be the company metronome. Set the schedule for board meetings, reporting, internal milestone meetings
and generally keep everyone on track - take notes, write memos, document decisions.
- Work closely with Senior Management in ensuring corporate governance and administration obligations
are fulfilled, with Companies House and HMRC.
- Manage the company diary including travel arrangements and meeting scheduling.
- Help with fundraising processes and investor communications.
- Help with team expansion and recruitment processes as we grow.
- Manage third party vendors e.g hubspot, office space, insurance providers etc.
- Assist the Commercial Lead, CEO and Chairman with prospecting and outreach.
- Provide a warm welcome for all visitors to the office as well as helping setup any meetings.
- Lead CEO special projects and initiatives where required.
- Give strategic input where appropriate.
- Be the day-to-day point of contact for our accountants and finance operations.

YOU WILL BE:

N I C E TO H AV E ( B U T N OT N EC ES SA RY ) :

PERKS
- A great communicator and a problem solver.
- A passion for gaming & esports and understand the scale of the problem and opportunity for Edge.
- 2+ years of work experience in a fast-paced environment (start-up / consulting / investment
banking).
- Excellent numerical, written and verbal communication skills.
- You are meticulous, organised, and able to tackle several projects simultaneously.
- Proven ability to work in a team and to be highly efficient.
- Effective with GSuite.
- A genuine enthusiasm to automate essential tasks.
- Someone who understands all the opportunity of working at a rapidly growing start-up, but also
how hard you have to work to make that a success!

- Legal experience.
- Work in a tech startup.
- Have finance or accounting experience and knowledge of Xero.
- HR experience / understanding of UK employment.

- Build the “go-to” solution for esports and gaming infrastructure.
- High impact position with autonomy to build systems and processes and great progression
opportunities.
- Work in a high calibre team in a fun, flexible working environment based in central London.
- Great overall package with EMI options for the right candidate

This is a full-time role with a base salary range of £25k - 30k dependent on experience.We’d like someone to start
asap!
If this sounds like a match we’d love to hear from you. Please reach out to
recruitment@edge.gg. Please include anything you feel is important and will help you stand out.
